Reviews.Title: “Not at all a memorable stay”
Reviews.Author: AIMINC
Reviews.Content: I found cockroaches in my bed, the living room and the bedroom wall. Cleanliness was terrible. There was no hot water on the first day, then the water ran out completely and had to call staff to fix the problem. The foyer bathroom had broken shower tray tub.The A/C controls were broken too.

Reviews.Title: “awosome”
Reviews.Author: Luck A
Reviews.Content: The staff were awesome and extremely friendly and courteous. The location of the hotel is brilliant, it is 15 minutes by car to Jumeirah beach, and around 10 minutes to Dubai Mall the biggest shopping centre in the world. The views from our room were stunning, and the cleanliness of the rooms was also fantastic. There is a 24 hours supermarket right next to the hotel, and also withing walking distance there is KFC, Pizza Hut, Coffee Shops & Restaurants and money exchangers. I would deffinitely stay at this hotel again.”

Reviews.Title: “Unreliable and unhelpful”
Reviews.Author: rosscn
Reviews.Content: THIS HOTEL DOES NOT HONOUR CONFIRMED BOOKINGS. I had booked two nights which had been paid for and confirmed however on arrival was told they where not prepared honour the arrangement. Most hotels where full in this area at the time and asking ten times the normal rate so to only be informed on arrival meant a very long and costly evening finding an alternative. I have viewed the rooms and can honsetly say that there is much better available in the same vacinity for the same price.

Reviews.Title: “Poor customer service, incompetent staff, worn out hotel”
Reviews.Author: natadi
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 1 night and paid 1000% of accommodation rate bacause of the incompetent person who charged my card 2 times and did not reverse the 10 times wrong amount at the time of transaction. We noticed a significant of money missing from our account a week later when we checked out our bank account statement. It took us another week to recover our money (still waiting actually). Please be careful with your money/card especially in this hotel. Or do not book it or stay here at all!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't recommend it!”
Reviews.Author: canuk78
Reviews.Content: I would NOT recommend this hotel. The front desk clerk is unfriendly and rude. The rooms are old and run down and have a strange smell to them. There were hairs throughout the sheets of my "clean" bed. Plug sockets next to the headboard of the bed were open with wires hanging out. The bathroom had mold and mildew everywhere, and the toilets looked like they hadn't been cleaned in a while. I would avoid this place at all costs. There are plenty of other hotel apartments in the same price range. We moved from here to the Savoy Crest, 100% improvement at a very similar cost.
